text.0:
Congratulations to the team at @Documentedny for winning the Gather Award for Engaged Journalism, Micro/Small Newsrooms at #ONA20!

We are honored to have supported them through our Community Listening Fellowship. Learn more about their project: https://t.co/09ndzF6Rfm https://t.co/hFqSVqLS50
text.2:
.@isthmus and @wortradio will produce and distribute coverage of election events in Wisconsin, voting patterns in swing communities, and more.

@TheNVIndy will continue building out its comprehensive Election section and translate all content into Spanish.
text.3:
.@cvilletomorrow will produce videos and expand its 2020 Voter Guide to cover how, where and when to vote.

@freep will hire a full-time, temporary reporter to cover mis- and disinformation threats to the local vote in Michigan.
text.4:
.@TB_Times will offer a text-specific number to provide audiences with election information. 

@news_collab & @spaceship_media have partnered to create a group dedicated to online dialogue about election misinformation.
text.5:
.@avantyouth will produce a visual rundown of Georgia’s election process targeted at younger voters. 

@MalheurNews will translate its election coverage and relevant social posts into Spanish.
text.6:
We are excited to announce that we have awarded 11 more newsrooms with a Trusted Elections Network microgrant!

A big thank you to @CraigNewmark Philanthropies & #ElectionSOS for the additional funding. Learn more about the awardees below: https://t.co/cCRIE9AP6L
